Module jakarta.nosql.communication.core
Package jakarta.nosql

Interface ValueReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Predicate<Class<?>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ValueReaderDecorator
    public interface ValueReader
extends Predicate<Class<?>>
    This interface represents the reader on the Value instance. When the Value needs a conversion, it will load the implementations from SPI, Java Service Provider. The Predicate verifies if the reader has the support the class type.
    See Also:
    Value, Value.get(Class), ValueWriter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <T> T read​(Class<T> type, Object value)
      Converts the value to the class type target.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.function.Predicate

        and, negate, or, test

           Object value)
        Converts the value to the class type target.

        T - - the type class

        type - - the new instance class

        Returns:
